edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.meta

Class AnalysisMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.meta.AnalysisMetadata
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class AnalysisMetadata
extends Object
implements Serializable
    AnalysisMetadata objects hold all the information on an analysis run including parameters used for input and the state of the parameters at output, input and output images, code versions, scripts, and quantification files.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  AnalysisMetadata.FileHash
      Holder for a hash calculcated on a file and a String that names the algorithm used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnalysisMetadata

        public AnalysisMetadata()
        Creates an empty AnalysisMetadata object.

    • Method Detail

      • makeCopy

        public AnalysisMetadata makeCopy()
        Makes a copy of this AnalysisMetadata object. Everything is deep copied except the contents of ImageSets storing input/output images, and the Method objects, both of which might contain image data. (The ImageSet objects themselves are copied.)
        Returns:
        another AnalysisMetadata object that is a copy of this one.

      • setInputImageHash

        public void setInputImageHash(String filename,
                     String algorithm,
                     String hash)
        Sets the value of hashing the input Image stored in the named file with the specified algorithm.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the image file
        algorithm - A string identifying the algorithm used to calculate the hash
        hash - the result of calculating the hash as a hexadecimal string

      • setInputParameters

        public void setInputParameters(ParameterDictionary in)
        Sets the ParameterDictionary used as input for the analysis.
        Parameters:
        in - the ParameterDictionary initialized with the input parameters.

      • setOutputParameters

        public void setOutputParameters(ParameterDictionary out)
        Sets the ParameterDictionary to be stored as output from the analysis.
        Parameters:
        out - the ParameterDictionary containing the output parameters.

      • setHasPreviousOutput

        public void setHasPreviousOutput(boolean has)
        Sets whether the AnalysisMetadata is loaded from a previous analysis run; this will enable certain checks like matching code versions and file hashes.
        Parameters:
        has - whether the analysis has information from a previous run

      • setInputImages

        public void setInputImages(ImageSet in)
        Sets the images used for input to the analysis. The value of the ImageSet the first time this is called will be stored separately for the purposes of tracking the initial input state.
        Parameters:
        in - an ImageSet containing the input images.

      • setOutputImages

        public void setOutputImages(ImageSet out)
        Sets the images to be stored as output from the analysis.
        Parameters:
        out - an ImageSet containing the output images.

      • getLibraryVersionXMLString

        public static String getLibraryVersionXMLString()
        Gets an XML-formatted String containing the library version information, including which commit in the git repository was used to build it.
        Returns:
        a String containing a library element with version and commit attributes, in XML format.

      • getInputParameters

        public ParameterDictionary getInputParameters()
        Gets the parameters to be used as input for the analysis.
        Returns:
        a ParameterDictionary containing the input.

      • getOutputParameters

        public ParameterDictionary getOutputParameters()
        Gets the parameters stored as output from the analysis.
        Returns:
        a ParameterDictionary containing the output.

      • getInputImages

        public ImageSet getInputImages()
        Gets the Images to be used as input for the analysis.
        Returns:
        an ImageSet containing the input Images.

      • getOriginalInputImages

        public ImageSet getOriginalInputImages()
        Gets the ImageSet that was stored from the first call to setInputImages.
        Returns:
        an ImageSet containing the original input Images.

      • getOutputImages

        public ImageSet getOutputImages()
        Gets the Images stored as output from the analysis.
        Returns:
        an ImageSet containing the output Images; these may or may not be loaded already.

      • getScript

        public RubyScript getScript()
        Gets any ruby script associated with the analysis.
        Returns:
        a RubyScript containing the script.

      • setScript

        public void setScript(RubyScript r)
        Sets the ruby script to be run for the analysis.
        Parameters:
        r - a RubyScript containing a valid script to be run.

      • hasScript

        public boolean hasScript()
        Queries whether the analysis has a script associated with it.
        Returns:
        true if there is a script to run, false otherwise.

      • getTime

        public Date getTime()
        Gets the timestamp associated with the analysis.
        Returns:
        a Date object containing the timestamp

      • timestamp

        public void timestamp()
        Timestamps the AnalysisMetadata with the current time.

      • addOutputFile

        public void addOutputFile(String filename)
        Adds an output file containing some non-image data.

      • getOutputFiles

        public List<String> getOutputFiles()
        Gets the names of all non-image output files.
        Returns:
        a List containing the filenames.

      • getOutputFileHash

        public String getOutputFileHash(String filename)
        Gets the hash of the named output file using the algorithm obtained by calling getOutputFileHashAlgorithm(String).
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename of the output file.
        Returns:
        the hash of that output file.

      • getOutputFileHashAlgorithm

        public String getOutputFileHashAlgorithm(String filename)
        Gets the algorithm used to hash the named output file
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename of the output file.
        Returns:
        the algorithm used to hash that output file.

      • validateInputImages

        public boolean validateInputImages(boolean logWarnings)
        Validates that the input images are the same as those used on a previous analysis run; only warns about images with matching filenames but different hashes.
        Parameters:
        logWarnings - specifies whether to log a warning if there is a mismatch.
        Returns:
        true if the validation was ok or there was no filename match; false if the hash mismatched

      • setMethod

        public void setMethod(Method m)
        Sets the method to be run for the analysis.
        Parameters:
        m - a Method object that will be run, and from which output will be retrieved.

      • getMethod

        public Method getMethod()
        Gets the method associated with the analysis.
        Returns:
        the Method that was run or will be run.
